info.title: Safe Place
info.description:
Before using this API, we recommend you read our **[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization-262)** for more information on how to generate an access token. 
  
Please also be aware that our test environment is based on a subset of the production, this API in test only returns a few selected cities. You can find the list in our **[data collection](https://github.com/amadeus4dev/data-collection)**.

get.summary: Returns safety rating for a given location and radius.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius of the search in Kilometer. Can be from 0 to 20, default value is 1 Km.

parameters.name: page[offset]
parameters.description: start index of the requested page

data.name: El Camp de l'Arpa del Clot (Barcelona)
El Camp d'en Grassot i Gràcia Nova (Barcelona)

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED               
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING

get.summary: Returns the safety rating of a given area

parameters.name: north
parameters.description: Latitude north of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: west
parameters.description: Longitude west of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: south
parameters.description: Latitude south of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: east
parameters.description: Longitude east of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: page[offset]
parameters.description: start index of the requested page

get.summary: Retieve safety information of a location by its Id.

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED               
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING

errors.detail: no response found for this query parameter
errors.title: NOT FOUND

source.title: Issue_Source

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

lgbtq.description: Likelihood of harm or discrimination against LGBTQ persons or groups and level of caution required at location. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).

medical.description: Likelihood of illness or disease, assessment of water and air quality, and access to reliable medical care. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).

overall.description: An average of the 6 “sub”-categories. Score go from 1 (very safe) to 100 (very dangerous).

physicalHarm.description: Likelihood of injury due to harmful intent. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).

politicalFreedom.description: Potential for infringement of political rights or political unrest. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).

theft.description: Likelihood of theft. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).

women.description: Likelihood of inappropriate behavior against females. Score go from 1 (not likely) to 100 (very likely).
